Message1.Name: We have a new tool called FMKE (FM Kit Editor) that allows you to create your own 3D match engine kit.

Message2.Name: FMKE allows you to create the kit the way you want, you can change colors, add badges, sponsors, etc..

StartUsingByPressingLoadGame.Name: To start using FMRTE just press the 'Load Game' button.

Recommended.Name: It's recommened to backup your savegame before you start editing it using FMRTE.

FindHelpGuidesOnOurWebsite.Name: You can find some guides describing how to use our features on our website

SubmitReport.Name: If you want to report a bug that you have found, please submit a bug report on our website

GroupsFixturesWillBeUpdated.Name: '###TEAM_A_GROUP###' and '###TEAM_B_GROUP###' fixtures will be updated automatically.

UnableToFindGroupFixturesForTeams.Name: FMRTE was unable to find any fixture for these groups/teams

SwappingTeamsWithoutFixtureWarning.Name: Swapping teams without updating all existent fixtures can corrupt your savegame

CheckIngameForGroupFixtures.Name: Please confirm in game if there are any fixture for those groups/teams

SwapTeamsMightHaveNoEffectIfQualificatio.Name: Swapping teams might have no effect if/when the group(s) qualifications have already been defined.

TeamsCannotBeTheSame.Name: Home and Away team cannot be the same

InformationMightBeOutdated.Name: The information about stages/ties/fixtures in this page is most likely outdated.

ReloadThisPageAndApplyChangesAgain.Name: We recommend you to reload this page and then apply your changes.

BackupYourSaveBeforeEditingTeams.Name: If you pretend to change home/away teams, or swap teams within groups, make sure that you have a backup of your save game before applying any of those changes.

FMRTE was unable to load your game.

GenericVersionWizzard.Name: FM24 - Add Support for new version Wizard

Description.Name:
STEP 1/6
Your version of FM 2023 (#####) must have been updated because FMRTE do not support it
To fix this you have three options: check if there is a new version of FMRTE available, follow this wizard and FMRTE will try to make it work with your game version, or copy a list of codes from someone that had already fix it
What do you want to do?

CheckOnline.Name: Check if there is a new version of FMRTE available

UseThisWizzard.Name: Use this wizard to try to make it work (RECOMENDED)

InvalidCode.Name: The code you have entered is not valid!

Description.Name:
STEP 2/6
To make FMRTE work with your game version, you need to confirm if the next date field shows your ingame date, if not, please correct it and press next.
NOTE: It's very important that you confirm that the date in the date field is right, otherwise FMRTE won't be able to load anything at all!

WrongDate.Name: Make sure that the ingame date is correct, because FMRTE was unable to detect that date as the correct ingame date!

Description.Name:
STEP 3/6
FMRTE needs to know the Id of your savegame, otherwise some features like freezing players won't work properly.
To help FMRTE find out your savegame Id, you need to do this: 1- First in FM24 create a new shortlist, you can add one or two players to that list 2- Save your shortlist 3- Export your shortlist (remember the folder where the list will be saved) 4- Now in this window, press the 'Load shortlist' button and select the shortlist that you have exported from FM24 5- Press the next button

STEP 4/6
From all information that you gave, FMRTE will now show you some persons. For each person, you have to copy and paste their name in FM24, and check what they are (Player, staff, etc..) Then change here their role! Make sure that you select the right role for each person, otherwise FMRTE won't work properly!

NoPersonDetected.Name: FMRTE could not find any person, you'll have to wait until a new version of FMRTE supports your game version!

EmptyTypes.Name: Please make sure that every person listed has a diferent type associated!

RepeatedPersonTypes.Name: You have two or more persons with the same person type associated, please fix it!

Description.Name:
STEP 5/6
We are almost done, now we just need to fix the current screen button.. If we don't fix this, some features like future transfers won't work properly..
To fix the current screen button please do this: 1- Go to FM24 and search for 'PLAYER NAME' 2- Open the player profile, and go to the player positions screen 3- Make sure that in FM24, you are on the player positions screen!! 4- In FMRTE, Press the 'Fix it' button 5- Wait for the response from FMRTE 6- Press 'Next'

NotFound.Name: FMRTE was unable to detect '#####'. Make sure that you are viewing that player positions screen in FM24. If you are, then press finish, but you won't be able to use the Current Screen feature!

Description.Name:
STEP 6/6
Finally we are done!
Now if you want, you can copy and paste that code to help other users that have the same version of FM24.
If for some reason you need to redo this again, please delete the folder 'SupportedVersions' inside FMRTE folder.
Remember, you should update FMRTE to a newer version as soon as you can, using FMRTE this way may or may not work properly..
IF YOU FIND ANY WEIRD VALUE STOP USING THIS VERSION OF FMRTE, IT MAY CORRUPT YOUR SAVEGAME!

NewVersionAdded.Name: New version added, please press the Load game button to see if this version works!

PersonsDetected.Name: For some reason FMRTE could not distinguish the person types of your game. For all persons listed bellow, you have to check in game (by copy-paste their name in FM24) their type (Player, Staff, etc..), then make their type in here match their type ingame. Make sure that you select the right role for each person, otherwise FMRTE won't work properly!

NoPersonDetected.Name: FMRTE could not find any person. Please make sure that your game was fully loaded on FM24 before you started FMRTE. If it was, then you'll have to wait until a new version of FMRTE supports your game version!

EmptyTypes.Name: Please make sure that every person listed has a diferent type associated!

RepeatedPersonTypes.Name: You have two or more persons with the same person type associated, please fix it!

Wonderkids.Name: Some of our best agents were on field and were able to find #NUM_NEW_WONDERKIDS# new wonderkids.

Wonderkids_2.Name: They compiled a report with some basic information about those players, including potential interested clubs. So hurry up and catch them before its too late!

Confidential.Name: The following information is strictly confidential so if anyone asks, you didn't hear it from us!

Unsubscribe.Name: If you are afraid and want to cancel this event press the #BUTTON_NAME# button.

InvalidFile.Name: The file that you entered does not exist!

WelcomeInfo.Name:
This wizard will guide you through the FMRTE Activation process.
If you don't have a license key, you can purchase one in our online store.
How do you want to activate FMRTE?

SearchClubMessage.Name: Type the name of the club

Title.Name: Information about how current screen works

Message.Name:
This button only works for players. Sometimes this feature might not work, or it can show you the wrong item(person, club, etc..).
To avoid this, in your game, you just need to move between one or two tabs.
For example: If ingame you are in a player profile, move to the player 'Attributes' tab or any other tab in his profile, then press the current screen button and it should work as expected.

Message.Title: FMRTE - Savegame Backup
Message.Message:
FMRTE can now backup your save games for you!
Everytime you make changes with FMRTE it will automatically create one backup of your current save game this way avoiding that you lose your precious save game and hard work when the things go wrong...
Please note that not all actions will generate one backup this will be done only for the more complex actions such edition of Future Transfer, Swaps etc.
Have a look at the backup configurations in the settings menu.

FacepackInstaller.Name: Facepack Installer
FacepackInstaller.Description:
Facepack installer is a new feature that allows you to easily install a facepack in your game!
It is compatible with Newgan facepacks.

MainWindow.ActivateFmrteMessage:
To use all FMRTE features, including saving changes, you need to have a valid license key.
To purchase a license please visit our website - ###LINK###
If you already have a license, just grab it from your Client Area in our website and activate FMRTE
